# Get the Data
```{r}
animal_outcomes <- readr::read_csv('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/master/data/2020/2020-07-21/animal_outcomes.csv')
```

# Load libraries
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(ggdark) # nsgrantham's ggdark package
library(png)
library(ggpubr)
```

# Visualize
```{r}
# Filter for rehoming
rehomed = dplyr::filter(animal_outcomes, outcome == "Rehomed")

# Plot
ggplot(rehomed, aes(year, Total, color = animal_type)) + geom_line() + dark_theme_gray() + labs(color = 'Animal Type') + labs(color = 'Animal Type', y = 'Number of rehomed animals', x = 'Year', title = 'Rehomed RSPCA Animals Over Time')
```
